group_1.textCenter: Ah! You guys are gonna be in the contest@too?

group_1.textLeft: We're not really here to win, though... We@just wanna have fun.

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Like, we're already here and all? So@why not enjoy everything, y'know?!

group_1.textLeft: You're right, Emily! The most important@thing is to have fun!

group_1.textRight: Are you gonna try to win, Ash?
They're offering some clothes by that@designer you like as the prize, aren't they?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! I'm definitely gonna win first place.@Just you watch!

group_1.textRight: Wow! Nice! Oh my gosh, now I'm kinda pumped@too!

group_1.narration: This kawaii fashionista duo@right here are Rika and Emily.@I met them at a shop in Sakae Ward@and we hit it off right away. They're so@much fun to chat about fashion with!

group_1.textCenter: Oops, almost forgot! I've got some@recommendations for you two!

group_1.textRight: That's our Ash! Always serving the best@looks!

group_1.textLeft: They're all soooooo cute!

group_1.textCenter: The stuff they had here's gone? Did they run@out here too?

group_1.textRight: Did someone already buy the different@color overalls over there?

group_1.textLeft: Overalls... Oh, those things! Now that you@mention it, what did happen to them?
I can't remember every single sale, but@if they're gone, I guess I sold them!

group_1.textRight: What were you trying to get?

group_1.textLeft: They were matching overalls in different@colors... I wanted to give you a twin look!

group_1.textRight: O.M.G.! I can't even! That sounds like SO@much fun!

group_1.textLeft: Right?!
Gimme just a moment, okay? I'll whip up@something for you two real quick.

group_1.narration: All done!@Matching shirts...@And here's the kicker!@A pair of denim shorts and a skirt@made out of the same fabric!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! TOTALLY kawaii!
Hey, wouldn't it be cute if we wore matching@outfits like this to go to a theme park?

group_1.textRight: Are you for real? I, like, LOVE that idea! @Sounds super fun!

group_1.textLeft: Yay! You'll have a real fresh student look@in those outfits!
Well...
Oh, yeah! I'm gonna get this scrunchie!@It's perfect for the contest.
And look at these... Matching scrunchies in@other colors!

group_1.textRight: Are you gonna match with Kumanosuke?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, what an awesome idea!
I wanted to get Riko a little something as a@souvenir, so I figured I'd match with her...
[chara:305201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]But for me, Riko, AND Kumanosuke to match?@That'd be the cutest thing EVER!
We still have some time until the contest@starts... I'll put on the finishing touches!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! We're gonna work our butts off, too!
Okay! Time we, like, got a...[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300601:motion_300][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]OH. MY. GOD!

group_1.textLeft: What's up?
Oh, yeah! Let's go!
